summary: DOI contains URL fragments (#article-xxx, #page=5, #sthash.xxx) from landing page URLs, causing validation failure. Represents ~15-20% of malformed DOIs.

notes: From doi_validation.py: Fragments like #article-info, #page=5, #t=toc, #sthash.xxx are stripped UNLESS the fragment is a trailing # alone (which can be valid in old Wiley DOIs). Pattern: split on '#', check if fragment looks like URL navigation state, strip if so.
